title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from 
Certain States) (No. 5) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 5) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 5) Regulations 
2021 (S.I. 135 of 2021) are amended, in Regulation 1(3), by the substitution of 
“the 19th day of July 2021” for “the 9th day of June 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 June, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [276] 3

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations extend until 19th July 2021 the effective date of S.I. No. 
135/2021 - Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 5) Regulations
